mapper.insert:
insert into board values(null, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, now(), (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(b.g_no) + 1, 1) from board b), 1, 0, #{user_no},'y')
select last_insert_id()
mapper.select: select b.no as no , b.title as title , b.contents as contents , b.hit hit , date_format(b.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as reg_date , b.g_no as g_no , o_no as o_no , b.depth as depth , b.user_no as user_no , u.name as name , b.state as state from board b, user u where b.user_no = u.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{cCount}, 5

select b.no as no , b.title as title , b.contents as contents , b.hit as hit , date_format(b.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as reg_date , b.g_no as g_no , o_no as o_no , b.depth as depth , b.user_no as user_no , u.name as name , b.state as state from board b, user u where b.user_no = u.no and b.title like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') and (b.state = 'y' or b.state = 'u') order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{cCount}, 5
select no , title , contents , g_no , o_no , depth from board where no = #{no}
select count(b.no) as count from board b, user u where b.user_no = u.no order by g_no desc
select count(b.no) as count from board b, user u where b.user_no = u.no and b.title like CONCAT('%',#{kwd},'%') and (b.state = 'y' or b.state = 'u') order by g_no desc
select no , board_no , original_name , save_name from uploadfile where board_no = #{no}
